DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to answer if an ergonomist can configure a daVinci robot console to improve surgeon discomfort. Adjustments to the robot console will be surgeon specific as they are tailored to their individual body type. Measurements will be taken at the time of console configuration.
DOC.criteria: Fellowship trained, specialty board certified gynecologic surgeon. Robot used for hysterectomy until completion of vaginal cuff closure. Any nonrobotic method to perform hysterectomy (laparotomy, nonrobotic laparoscopic, vaginal approach).
